strIntroduction: 大道养心，太极养生。太极拳动作柔和、速度较慢、拳式并不难学，而且架势的高低、运动量的大小都可以根据个人的体质而有所不同，能适应不同年龄、体质的需要，不仅能运动健身，更能锻炼心身，无论是初学者还是武术高手，一定都能获得不同的乐趣！
strTitle: 【全民疯养生】学习太极拳半日游（全程4-5小时）

strIntroduction: 走進同里古鎮，典型江南水鄉的味道就這麼飄了過來。這裡氣候宜人，冬暖夏涼，四季氣候景色都是這麼的迷人，春季的煙雨綿綿，春雨和薄霧籠罩在古城之上。夏季有許多民俗活動。秋季桂花飄香、秋高氣爽。冬季更能體味古鎮寂美，享受閒散時光。走，一起來領略這座古鎮水鄉的寧靜秀美吧
strTitle: 【波光橋影，詩情畫意】上海同里古鎮 包車一日遊（上海出發）

strIntroduction: 金沙遺址博物館留下了許多商周時期四川地區古蜀文化的文物，除了讓您能夠馬上聯想到古戰場的面貌，更能看盡成都從古至今的變化，館內五個展覽廳豐富的古文物讓您覽盡這裡過去的點點滴滴。
strTitle: 【3000年前古蜀文明】金沙遺址博物館門票

strIntroduction: 提盞燈籠，夜登長城，往下望欣賞古鎮夜景，遊長城最浪漫的玩法，讓您永難忘懷。或是漫步小鎮，感受古樸的建築及小橋流水，體驗特別的京城小鎮印象。
strTitle: 【最豪華的中國風古鎮】古北水鎮入園門票

strIntroduction: 朱家角是上海郊區的一個古鎮，有江南水鄉的別緻，來到這裡可以欣賞漂亮的山水景致以及些許美味的小吃，在現代人時時刻刻繁忙的腳步裡偷閒，何嘗不是一種生活中的小確幸。
strTitle: 【上海威尼斯】朱家角 包車一日遊（上海出發）

strIntroduction: 享受汽车无法承载的悠闲，这次我们只钻胡同，不走大路，触摸历史的痕迹，品尝道地私房小吃，讲讲北京故事，让京城达人带你走进当地人的生活日常，一天进阶变身成为老北京！
strTitle: 【一天变成老北京】达人带路：经典胡同+私房小吃自行车半日遊

strIntroduction: 到成都旅行，觀景是其次，重在休閒體驗，一定要看一場經典的川劇變臉！這場傳奇變臉秀更是您不能錯過的體驗項目，《傳奇變臉秀》不只是變臉，而且還帶有故事性，讓我們一起來感受完全不同於傳統川劇的視聽感受吧！
strTitle: 【川劇變臉】芙蓉國粹川劇秀傳奇變臉門票

strIntroduction: 不论你是电影迷、对拍摄电影的手法感到好奇又或者是想一窥电影摄影的器具及场景，都非常适合前来上海电影博物馆，踏进这座四层楼的建筑物，游览着过去到现在的电影史，馆内多样化的设施以及先进的服务带您切入不同角度去欣赏电影的世界
strTitle: 【中国电影的前世今生】上海电影博物馆门票

strIntroduction: 蘇州拙政園被稱為中國園林之母，歷史悠久、佔地面積廣、環境優美、園林建築典雅古樸，是來蘇州的必去之地，其靜謐質樸的生活氣息與咫尺之外的喧鬧鼎沸彷彿置身兩個世界，喜愛寧靜欣賞“水路並行，河街相鄰”的你絕對不可以錯過這個行程
strTitle: 【中國園林之母】蘇州拙政園、寒山寺、姑蘇水上游 包車一日遊

strIntroduction: “天下功夫出少林”，无论是因为看过《少林寺》这部电影对少林寺心生向往，或是看过武侠小说对少林武当有说不出道不明的情怀，少林寺对功夫迷可说是圣地般的存在，是中国武术及文化的精髓！固定时间表演精彩的功夫秀，身临其境才会发现这是多么的壮观宏大的场面，多庄严的少林寺！
strTitle: 【少林寺包车】郑州出发至少林寺专车服务一日游

strIntroduction: 結合韓國傳統樂器的「亂打秀」，亂大秀從百老匯紅回亞洲！韓國必看熱門秀，現在在廣州也看得到！超越國界、不分語言和男女老少！
strTitle: 【值回票價韓國舞台劇】《亂打神廚》 廣州市熱烈開演

strIntroduction: 北京最令人着迷的是它的古老历史。伟壮丽气派辉煌的皇宫,依山傍水宏大磅礴的陵墓,美丽秀雅的皇家公园，这里荟萃了灿烂的文化艺术,保留了许多名胜古迹和人文景观，走入歷史来一场穿越时空的约会吧！

strIntroduction: 西塘，號稱活著的千年古鎮，在這裡能夠感受到江南水鄉的清靜和淳樸的風情，保存得完整的原生態水鄉。白天行走在煙雨長廊，靜靜享受古鎮的慢時光，晚上燈籠亮起成了美麗的夜景，酒吧更是個熱鬧的地方。來到這裡，放慢生活的腳步，釋放束縛的心靈。
strTitle: 【小橋流水人家】上海浙江西塘古鎮 包車一日遊（上海出發）

strIntroduction: 无限风光在险峰，爬过了箭扣，或许就留不住对其他长城的印象了。这段长城坡度最陡、游客最少、景色最原始、后人鲜少重新修整，风景自然纯粹，看腻了人山人海的朋友欢迎来挑战！

strIntroduction: 你知道甄嬛传拍摄地、清朝的雍亲王府，都是重要的宗教圣地吗？专业导游带您一天走访三大古刹，踩着丘处机真人、雍正皇帝的足迹，探索佛教、道教、藏传佛教的源远流长。

strIntroduction: 甘肅南部異彩紛呈、特色濃厚，並具有原始性、神秘性和多樣性，這裡的魅力已經引起世人的廣泛關注和中外遊客的青睞，更被譽為美麗神奇、純淨聖潔的香巴拉。 KKday精心安排了甘南之旅，快到蘭州集合吧！

strIntroduction: 康熙、乾隆、慈禧太后的生活圈是什么样子？北京皇家行程，专业资深导游带你一日穿越中国皇室与高级大臣的生活圈。北京必游路线，纯包车导览，保证无购物、午餐自理，自由度高，不会伤了皇城之内的和气。

strIntroduction: 烏鎮，小橋流水人家，一個來過，心就未曾離開的地方。演員劉若英說過，「如果想休息一下，希望去的地方會有浪漫和奇跡發生，那麼去烏鎮。」東柵與西柵的景色各有特色，東柵，安靜秀氣的立在東市河水之上，更多的是古樸。水巷古橋和白牆被燈火映照著，夜晚的烏鎮，美得令人心醉，燈火闌珊只等你的到來。

strIntroduction: 天平山以怪石、清泉、紅楓等三絕著稱，尤以紅楓為最，每年初冬，秋染天平山，山中紅葉遍野，景色美不勝收。 讓我們來欣賞這片蘇州最美的賞楓聖地吧。

strIntroduction: 西湖之夜是一齣以杭州的歷史文化為背景的歌舞表演，融合了杭州的民俗風情、用大型的舞蹈、戲曲等藝術形式表演。劇中還可感受到《梁祝》中“十八相送”的足跡。還有眾多的爱情故事可循跡，展示了杭州作為“爱情之都”的浪漫和魅力

strIntroduction: 一说到北京，首先想到的是它迷人的古老历史，荟萃了灿烂的文化艺术，保留了许多名胜古迹和人文景观，伟壮丽气派辉煌的皇宫，依山傍水宏大磅礴的陵墓，美丽秀雅的皇家公园，绵延万里历经数朝的长城，都是后人珍贵的宝藏。现在就动身去探索北京城吧！

strIntroduction: “终南山下，活死人墓；神雕侠侣，绝迹江湖”。终南山结合南方和北方山脉的特点与金庸武侠的大气磅礴，“天下修道，终南为冠”，自古有隐逸的传统，至今仍是隐士的天堂，每年都有不少人不远千里慕名而来，据报导目前约有6000人散居于此修行，幸运的话，或许能遇到高人指點喔！

strIntroduction: 比起秦始皇兵马俑的肃穆刚烈，阳陵汉俑显得平和而从容，反映“文景之治”中的社会;喜欢金庸武侠小说《神雕侠侣》的朋友对重阳宫一定不陌生，有名的活死人墓和全真道祖师王重阳早年修道和葬骨之地。去一个地方的博物馆转转，就能了解这城市的前世今生。現在就重回西安二千多年前感受无与伦比的韵味吧！

strIntroduction: 黄山，古代称为“天子都”，因为它雄伟秀丽，又神秘莫测，像是天帝和神仙的居所。每一个登上黄山的游客，在回望山下时，都会对它有别于五岳的美由衷赞叹，壮阔与秀丽在这里并存。直达车让你说走就走，无压力无负担，用最适合自己的步调，尽情游览黄山

strIntroduction: 北京大观园是红楼梦的拍摄地，也是甄嬛传的外景地。还记得勤政殿、清凉殿、碧桐书院吗？走进占地13公顷的大观园，耗巨资建设考究的园林建筑、亭台楼阁，让您瞬间穿越200年！
strTitle: 【甄嬛传外景地】北京大观园门票

strIntroduction: Lhasa maintain their own mysterious charm, quickly absorbed the colorful cultures around the world, regardless of what place to come, and this deep exotic will hit you right away, such as in a dream, for this piece of pure land plateau, and there was cause for a long time can not forget the blue sky, and anyone can not resist.
strTitle: 【Lhasa, Tibet】5-day Lhasa Samye Monastery Tour（Including Accommodation）A2

strIntroduction: 曾經有過搭乘直昇機俯瞰都市美好景色的夢想嗎？這趟空中夢想之旅可以帶您穿越南京市的上空，空中的景色更是讓人美不勝收，準備好來一趟穿梭在都市中刺激的飛行初體驗了嗎？
strTitle: 【直升機包機體驗】俯瞰南京市最美風景 空中飛行20分鐘

strIntroduction: 想感受世界級的運動場館嗎？喜歡游泳的你，一定不想錯過的北京水立方，讓你能在運動員的最高殿堂奧運場館縱身一躍，不管是戲水健身，都值得你來一探究竟！
strTitle: 【走入奧運殿堂】水立方游泳參觀卷

strIntroduction: 在北京歷史悠久的戲園廣德樓，欣賞最道地的京味兒相聲表演，由時下最夯的相聲演員郭德綱先生領軍的北京德雲社精彩演出，到北京絕對不能錯過！
strTitle: 【大柵欄聽相聲】北京廣德樓德云社相聲演藝門票

strIntroduction: 法国作家维克多雨果称之为“理想与艺术的典范”，康熙送给雍正的礼物，清朝末年曾被英法联合洗劫，圆明园是一个充满故事的地方，或许你也能在这里谱写属于你的故事！
strTitle: 【中国的凡尔赛宫】万园之园－圆明园遗址门票

strIntroduction: 感受自然環境與野生動物共處的生態區域，沒有牢籠的動物們神采飛揚的樣子，讓您大開眼界，探索這片以保護生態及動物為主旨的動物園！
strTitle: 【生態基地】北京野生動物園門票

strIntroduction: 南京，風華絕代的城市，帶領你走入歷史的中山陵，自然風景與中國傳統園林建築的完美結合，遊覽夫子廟，感受千年來人文薈萃的儒家文化，喜愛中國傳統建築的你，絕對不能錯過，快來自在徜徉南京。
strTitle: 【南京絕代風華】南京博物院、總統府、中山陵、夜遊夫子廟 一日自由行

strIntroduction: 上海野生动物园也可以看到熊猫宝宝，还有超萌呆草泥马！动物园内结合俄罗斯国际大马戏团表演，震撼你的视觉感官！除此之外，精彩的海狮表演也是园内不容错过的精采表演！
strTitle: 【上海野生动物园】动物园＋俄罗斯国际马戏团 超值套票

strIntroduction: 丝绸之路在历史上有着无法撼动的历史价值和意义，跟随前人的脚步，走一趟历史悠久的文化之旅，听千年的爱恨情仇，看河西走廊小麦金黄，瓜果飘香，到青海湖畔找那美丽好姑娘，远处的祁连山皑皑白雪，到敦煌一睹莫高风采，气势磅礴的西北风光只能让你赞叹，讓我們在荒漠苍凉的草原中探索旅行的意义！
strTitle: 【丝路 x 环青海湖】祁连山．柴达木盆地．敦煌．茶卡盐湖 丝路探险9日

strIntroduction: 有人这么说過，看水要去九寨沟，看山还是去稻城亚丁，神山美景，在海拔4200以上的地方徒步是非常不一样的体验，朝圣最为纯净佛国色达，跟随众多藏民和僧人转经，走进他们的生活，体验他们的生活方式，体验一段摄影人最爱的绝美之旅，感受信仰的强大、内心的宁静！
strTitle: 【最后的香格里拉】色达．稻城亚丁心灵之旅拼团8日游

strIntroduction: Ho Chi Minh city, aka. Saigon is the biggest city in Vietnam and also the former capital of the Southern Vietnam during the Vietnamese war. Saigon is enriched by the Chinese, French and traditional Vietnamese cultures and life styles. Let's explore the highlights of Vietnamese life and Ho Chi Minh!
strTitle: Ho Chi Minh City 1 Day Tour

strIntroduction: Start your day with a 2-hour guided for sightseeing Saigon to discover the best places of the city!

strIntroduction: Every year, Hue attracts a lot of tourist coming all over the world. The most famous tour they often choose to discover Hue is Hue city tour which shows tourists not only special historical sites but also beautiful landscapes of the ancient city.
strTitle: Explore the History of Hue

strIntroduction: My Tho is 86 km away from Ho Chi Minh City and one of the attractive destinations not to be missed. The major economy of My Tho is from agriculture. Coconut trees occupy most of its land, thus it dominates the My Tho’s scenery. There will be activities such as taking a boat ride on Tien River, overlooking the floating houses along the river, sitting on a horse-cart and taking part in learning how to make the coconut candies as well as participating in rowing a small boat in a canal…
strTitle: My Tho and Ben Tre Full Day Join-in Trip

strIntroduction: This tour will take you to many places for discovery street food, local culture. You will visit district 3, 10 and 5 on this journey and visit Saigon’s flower market and Cao Dai temple as well. It’s really exciting! Book it now and be closer to Sai Gon!
strTitle: Saigon Street Food Trip with Master Chef

strIntroduction: Coach trip to Ninh Binh, 100km down the South of Hai Noi to see Hoa Lu citadel, the first capital of Vietnam in the 10th century with visiting 2 temples of the Dinh King and the Le King.
strTitle: Hoa Lu to Tam Coc 1 Day Trip (Ninh Binh )

strIntroduction: Hoi An is a must-to-go destination when visiting the Central of Vietnam. Its unique beauty attracts thousands travelers every year. This tour brings you a chance to discover Hoi An Ancient Town in your own way. Don’t forget to visit Japanese Bridge, Old Houses Complex and other highlights before we meet each other for lunch. Beside that the Hoi An Cuisine is also one of the best favor in Vietnam so take this chance to taste some local food such as White Rose Cake, Cao Lau (Instant wheat noodle). If you are a shopaholic don’t miss to have a look at silk shop for tailor make your clothes with amazing quickly in couple hours.
strTitle: Visit Hoi An In Your Own Way - Private Tour

strIntroduction: Content yourself with an atmospheric scene of mountains wreathed in mist !
strTitle: Ba Na Hill - The Road To Heavenly Scenery

strIntroduction: Having exquisite Vietnamese life style by watching the Water Puppetry show, enjoying dinner on the night cruise and riding on the local rickshaw.

strIntroduction: Ninh Binh is a hidden gem of Vietnam. The natural tourist attractions like rain forest, limestone peaks are waiting for you to explore!
strTitle: Limestone Gem- Ninh Binh 1 Day Trip

strIntroduction: 整個大型水上匯演是一個穿越時空的史詩式愛情故事，將帶領觀眾進入一個魔幻無邊的奇妙國度，經歷截然不同的情感之旅，從哀、怒的深淵出發，直達慾望的頂尖，直至喜悅的高峰，徘徊在恐懼的邊緣，最終以愛衝破怨恨。這個超越拉斯韋加斯製作的驚世匯演，將帶您進入前所未見的視覺震撼新里程。
strTitle: 【限時限量C區升B區】澳門新濠天地『水舞間』電子票(贈送8字摩天輪)

strIntroduction: Enjoy a fast and scenic speedboat trip to the Mekong Delta departing by boat from our pier in Ho Chi Minh City.
strTitle: Mekong Delta Speedboat Tour

strIntroduction: Trang An Eco-Tourism Complex is a complex beauty - landscapes called as an 'outdoor geological museum' with numerous caves, mountains, valley water, trees and the historic relic. Bai Dinh pagoda is the largest pagoda in this complex that known as many records such as: the largest pagoda of Vietnam, the biggest gold - plated copper of Asia and the longest lobby in Asia. Join with us to discover the beauty of this majestic landscape.
strTitle: Discover Majestic Trang An Complex

strIntroduction: Phong Nha – Ke Bang area has a group of over 300 caves multi – shaped known as the “Kingdom of the cave”, where there is a mystery of wonders and attraction, a paradise for scientists in caves, explorers and tourists.
strTitle: Phong Nha - Ke Bang National Park 1 Day

strLocation: Vietnam, Hue, Da Nang, Hoi An
strTitle: Danang and Hoi An 1 Day Tour

strIntroduction: Hanoi’s Old Quarter is famous by its old architecture and culinary. There are not only big luxury restaurants but also small shops and stalls even in corners with various kinds of food. By Hanoi street food tour, we bring you to visit Old Quarter and to try local food and drinks. Many of them are only well-known by local people such as mixed fruits, egg coffee, etc. It’s also an opportunity to learn more about Hanoi culture through culinary. Let’s join with us.
strTitle: Hanoi Street Food

strIntroduction: With this tour, you will have a chance to visit 2 most beautiful islands and enjoy wonderful atmosphere on boat and watch sunset. You also will join in catching fishing and squid with local fishermen and taste dishes from your achievement. How interesting the tour is!
strTitle: Phu Quoc Snorkeling and Fishing 1 Day Excursion

strIntroduction: The tour brings you to areas in Hue rarely seen by visitor, in a fun and unique way on a nice scooter with Vietnamese ladies in traditional Ao Dai as tour guides. This tour is a personal experience and our colorfully dressed ladies will do their best to insure it includes the things you want to see, after all, it is your vacation and what you want is paramount.
strTitle: Discovering The Beauty Of Hue With Ao Dai

strIntroduction: Pre-1975, the city was where the heroic resistance against aggressors and the struggling process for independence took place. But today, the city is bustling with people and it is the major financial hub of the country as well as the biggest city of Viet Nam. Cu Chi tunnels are one of the most famous historical vestiges of Viet Nam’s national liberation war. The network consists of over 200km of tunnels connected with one another like a cobweb.
strTitle: Cu Chi Tunnel and Saigon City Join-in Tour

strIntroduction: One day sunrise tour to Hoi An fish village. Help the fisherman to catch the fish, learn to paddle a unique Vietnamese bamboo basket boat, and enjoy the complimentary breakfast prepared by our chef Captain Cook!
strTitle: Fish Market At The Sunrise Tour

strIntroduction: Best Eco-Adventure speedboat tour to the Can Gio Mangrove Forest (UNESCO Biosphere Reserve).
strTitle: Discover Can Gio Forest Tour

strIntroduction: Our tour will take you to the great nature beauty of Phu Quoc Island. You will have an opportunity to visit 2 most beautiful islands – Finger Island and Turtle Island. Enjoy lunch and relaxed atmosphere with us. Book it now!
strTitle: North Phu Quoc Snorkeling and Fishing Fun

strIntroduction: Come to Perfume Pagoda, you may feel like your spirituality lives in harmony with nature. ... Visit the Buddhist shrine built inside grottoes and ride on a boat to see the Vietnamese style of river view. Book the tour online and be ready to enjoy the most beauty of Vietnam.
strTitle: Perfume Pagoda 1 Day Trip

strIntroduction: Da Nang is a beautiful city in the central of Vietnam. It’s even more beautiful at night when all the lights are turned on. Let’s join with us to discover its charm at night and trying kinds of local food in order to know more about this city. You will see the thrilling views while riding on this beautiful roads, enjoy best local food and explore real Da Nang life.
strLocation: Vietnam, Ha Long Bay, Da Nang
strTitle: Da Nang By Night Tour - Private Tour

strIntroduction: 富國島因為沒有被過度開發，保有清澈的海水和潔白的沙灘，且該島盛產珍珠，故又被稱為「珍珠島」。
strTitle: Phu Quoc Chartered Bus 1 day tour

strIntroduction: Da Nang is a beautiful city near beach landing in the Central of Vietnam. It owns many interesting highlights that we will introduce to you in this trip, such as Son Tra Penisula, Marble Mountains, Cham Museum, etc. And last but not least, you also have chances to see and enjoy people’s daily life by visiting Han Market. Let’s join.
strTitle: Explore Da Nang In One Day

strIntroduction: This tour will bring to you unforgettable memories about daily life of people on Tam Giang Lagoon. Enjoying the peace of the river, the change of time and life and take some beautiful pictures of sunset on Tam Giang Lagoon.
strTitle: Sunset On Tam Giang Lagoon

strIntroduction: Know deeper about Sapa within the 3D2N Sapa Cuture Tour. Travel to the local small town, admire the spectacular waterfall, shop around the traditional market, interact with the local people.
strTitle: Sapa 3D2N Private Trip (Stay in 3 star hotel)

strIntroduction: One thing you can never miss when visiting Saigon is the market. Get yourself sit in a cyclo, and let the puller take you to see the true color of this city.

strIntroduction: After several business trips or a day excursions, you will find yourself thoroughly relaxed at a luxury comfortable spa with tranquil ambience and unexpectedly professional service.
strTitle: Relaxing at comfy SPA in Hanoi！

strIntroduction: 和另一半來場下龍灣的甜蜜浪漫之旅吧！美麗的下龍灣是遠古時期的自然奇觀，根據越南的神話傳說，很久以前，有一條母龍降落在這個海灣，擋住了洶湧的波濤，使這一帶人民安居樂業，因此人們便把這個海灣稱為“下龍灣”。下龍灣有「海上桂林」之稱，聯合國教科文組織於1994年將下龍灣列入世界文化遺產
strTitle: Halong Bay 4-Star Huong Hai Sealife Cruise 2D1N

strIntroduction: An in-day tour will take you to highlights of Da Nang such as Marble Mountains, Thuy Son, Linh Ung pagoda, My Khe beach, etc. Furthermore, you also have a chance to visit the Cham Sculpture Museum, which has the world’s largest collection of Cham artifacts. Don’t forget to take some great pictures in our trip, you will not want to miss it!
strTitle: Da Nang Day Trip

strIntroduction: Travel to the local town and explore the nature park. See the pristine Sapa within the 2D1N Sapa Tour.
strTitle: Colorful Viernam: 2D1N Sapa Tour(Stay in 4 star hotel)

strIntroduction: rom the market to your plate - no more secrets with our English speaking Vietnamese Chef. You will have a great opportunity to try cooking dishes with Vietnamese flavours. And you can pick fresh ingredients by yourself and our Chef will instruct you how to make a delicious plate. Enjoy it now!

strIntroduction: Enjoy your best adventure in Sapa from hiking to the top of Fansipan and being lost in this amazing mountain paradise!

strIntroduction: Cu Chi Tunnel is the location of several military campaigns and famous for being used as a hideout for surprise attacks against the American and their allied troops in the Vietnam War.
strTitle: Cu Chi Tunnel and Saigon City 1 Day Private Trip

strIntroduction: 富國島又有「珍珠島」之美稱，最吸引人的一點就是沒有被過度開發，這裡潔淨而安全的海灘甚至勝過峇厘島！
strTitle: 【Amusement park】Vinpearl Land

strIntroduction: Da Nang is the most ideal city in Vietnam. People here, lifestyle here, behaviour to each others here, which are good and attract visitors to drop by once. Our tour contains many activities to help you discover the beauty of this rich city. You may go around the city and see clean streets, the Han river – the city pride and go to Han market for shopping as well as seeing the merchants selling various products. You will enjoy meal with best fish cake noodle soup in town and a cup of traditional Vietnamese coffee.Walking is encouraged in our tour.
strTitle: Say Hello To Da Nang City
